goal: Fix infinite loading state in MermaidGraph component.
requirements: Implement a timeout (e.g., 2 seconds) for the `mermaid.render` call to prevent infinite spinning.
Ensure `loading.value` is ALWAYS set to false, even if errors occur.
Log the generated `diagramCode` to the console for debugging visibility.
Add a fallback: if rendering fails, display the raw mermaid code in a `<pre>` block so the user can still see the logic.
Verify `mermaid.initialize` configuration is compatible with version 11.x.
